snippet: "Goodbar," at the Under the Radar festival, is a rock adaptation of the 1975 novel "Looking for Mr. Goodbar."
abstract: "Goodbar," at the Under the Radar festival, is a rock adaptation of the 1975 novel "Looking for Mr. Goodbar."
lead_paragraph: "Goodbar" is a live concert adaptation of Judith Rossner's 1975 novel, "Looking for Mr. Goodbar," conceived by Kevin Townley and Arian Moayed with their theater company Waterwell.
